pr_title: Fix for Constructor injection when using OpenApi annotations in JAX-Rs resource

timeline.bodyText: We usually use plain strings for the class names in the build items.
timeline.author: gsmet

timeline.bodyText: This needs proper Javadoc. Not entirely sure about the name.
timeline.author: gsmet

timeline.bodyText: Why not adding the whole org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations package?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText:
The implementation of the detection of "allowed" annotation was not able to detect the root package of an annotation, only the package of the annotation itself, that's why I included all package of every OpenApi annotations.
I improved the detection to declare the root package of a set of annotations like OpenAPI
replies.author: vietk
